pr_title: SONARJAVA-2154 Remove usage of ImmutableMap from java-checks module

timeline.message: Remove usage of ImmutableMap from java-checks
SONARJAVA-2154 Remove usage of ImmutableMap from java-checks
SONARJAVA-2154 Remove usage of ImmutableMap from java-checks

timeline.bodyText:
Why not keep the usual map name of inserting items put() ?
It would make most of the changes transparent.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.bodyText: Why not add a reference, or small explanation here, telling that Java9+ Immutable Map Static Factory Methods are going to be useful in the future, and might be used to replace this class.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar
timeline.diffHunk:

timeline.bodyText: Also, in order to make it useful for everyone in this rework, I would recommend to put it in org.sonar.java.collections package from the java-frontend module.
